author: sudhaahuja
body: This PR is to update the MET and HT prompt monitoring with the paths proposed in this ticket (https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-1385) with a PFHT condition. This branch was created on top of the last commit changes in the code for MET and HT monitor from this PR #18978
title: Update MET and HT monitoring with paths with PFHT condition
